Label: Democratic Republic of São Tomé and Príncipe
column3: São Tomé and Príncipe gained independence from Portugal in 1975.

Label: Federal Republic of Nigeria
column3: The country gained its independence from Britain in 1960.

Label: Independent Republic of Biafra
column3: Secessionist state that existed from 1967 to 1970 in South-eastern Nigeria.

Label: Islamic Republic of Mauritania
column3: Mauritania gained independence from France in 1960.

Label: Kingdom of Galatia
column3: A client state of the Roman Empire after 64 BC. Unified by Deiotarus, first king of Galatia.

Label: People's Republic of China
column3: From 1949.

Label: Peoples' Republic of Bulgaria
column3: Bulgaria became People's Republic in 1946 after abolishing monarchy. The Republic followed the Russian pattern, but in 1990 the communist government was forced to resign after demonstrations.

Label: Republic of Angola
column3: Angola became independent from Portugal in 1975.

Label: Republic of Benin
column3: The Republic of Benin was known as Dahomey until 1975. It gained independence from France in 1960.

Label: Republic of Chad
column3: Chad became independent from France in 1960.

Label: Republic of Congo
column3: Also referred as Congo-Brazzaville. People's Republic of Congo (1969-1992).

Label: Republic of Equatorial Guinea
column3: The Republic of Equatorial Guinea became independent from Spain in 1968.

Label: Republic of Gabon
column3: The Republic of Gabon was formed in 1960 after it gained independence from France.

Label: Republic of Liberia
column3: Liberia gained independence from the United States of America in 1847.

Label: Republic of Mozambique
column3: Mozambique became independent from Portugal in 1975.

Label: Republic of Namibia
column3: Namibia gained independence from South Africa in 1990.

Label: Republic of Niger
column3: Niger gained independence from France in 1960.

Label: Republic of Palau
column3: Formerly part of the Trust Territory of the Pacific Islands. Republic formed in 1981, followed by independence in 1994 after the end of United Nations trusteeship.

Label: Republic of Rhodesia
column3: Unrecognised state of the former British colony of Southern Rhodesia (modern Zimbabwe).

Label: Republic of Senegal
column3: The Republic of Senegal became independent from France in 1960.

Label: Republic of Somaliland
column3: Former British Somaliland Protectorate. Not recognised by the Somali Democratic Republic.

Label: Republic of Uganda
column3: Gained independence from the United Kingdom in 1962.

Label: République Française
column3: France became a Republic after Louis XVI's monarchy was overthrown by the 1789 French Revolution. France was then controlled by the National Assembly, later to beome the National Constituent Assembly. Defence of the Republic by Revolutionaries was a primary reason behind the Terror of the mid-1790's.

Label: State of Katanga
column3: Katanga proclaimed independence from the itself newly independent Democratic Republic of the Congo on 11 July 1960. It was re-adsorbed on January 21 1963.
